item.title: 康德摩根公司将继续实施耗资 14 亿美元的密西西比河渡口项目
item.description: 康德摩根公司（Kinder Morgan）周四表示，其田纳西天然气管道公司（Tennessee Gas Pipeline）将继续实施耗资近 14 亿美元的密西西比穿越项目（Mississippi Crossing Project，MSX 项目），从而加强该管道运营商在美国东南部市场的地位。【原文：Kinder Morgan said on Thursday its unit Tennessee Gas Pipeline will proceed with the nearly $1.4 billion Mississippi Crossing Project (MSX Project), strengthening the pipeline operator's position in the Southeast U.S. markets.】

item.title: 各州和环保组织撤销对美国邮政电动汽车采购计划的诉讼
item.description: 以加利福尼亚州为首的 16 个州和环保组织已经撤销了 2022 年提起的一项诉讼，该诉讼旨在阻止美国邮政服务公司购买主要以天然气为动力的新一代快递车辆的计划。【原文：A group of 16 states led by California and environmental groups have dropped a lawsuit filed in 2022 that sought to block the U.S. Postal Service's plan to buy mostly gas-powered next-generation delivery vehicles.】

item.title: 印度 Tech Mahindra 公司首席执行官表示，该公司的目标是在银行科技支出中占据更大份额
item.description: 印度 Tech Mahindra 公司首席执行官在接受采访时表示，该公司正在加强对银行、金融服务和保险（BFSI）业务的重视，以缩小与大型同行的差距，因为这些同行历来从这一利润丰厚的领域获得更多收入。【原文：India's Tech Mahindra is stepping up focus on its banking, financial services and insurance (BFSI) business in a bid to bridge the gap with larger peers which have historically made more revenue from the lucrative segment, its CEO said in an interview.】

item.title: 更加鹰派的美联储政策委员会或将在 2025 年增加异议
item.description: 2025 年，一批略显鹰派的美联储地区银行行长将成为美国央行利率制定小组的投票人，这使得明年任何进一步的降息措施都有可能引发更多类似克利夫兰联储主席周三所表达的异议。【原文：A slightly more hawkish set of Federal Reserve regional bank presidents will become voters on the U.S. central bank's rate-setting panel in 2025, raising the chance that any further interest rate cuts next year could spur more dissents like the one seen on Wednesday from the head of the Cleveland Fed.】

item.title: 美国抵押贷款利率在连续三周下降后上升
item.description: 在美联储预计 2025 年降息次数减少、10 年期国债收益率上升之后，本周美国抵押贷款利率在连续三周下降后有所上升，并可能进一步上升。【原文：U.S. mortgage rates increased this week following three straight weekly declines and could rise further after the Federal Reserve projected fewer interest rate cuts in 2025, boosting the yield on the 10-year Treasury note.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称，鉴于美国的高度不确定性，美联储在利率问题上采取了适当行动
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）发言人朱莉-科扎克（Julie Kozack）周四表示，鉴于美国经济的高度不确定性，国际货币基金组织认为美联储周三的降息和采取更加谨慎的前景展望是适当的。【原文：The International Monetary Fund views Wednesday's Federal Reserve interest rate cut and adoption of a more cautious outlook as appropriate given high U.S. economic uncertainty, IMF spokesperson Julie Kozack said on Thursday.】

item.title: 土耳其 Pegasus 航空公司订购 100 架波音 737 MAX 10 喷气式飞机
item.description: 波音公司周四表示，土耳其低成本航空公司飞马航空公司（Pegasus Airlines）已确定订购 100 架 737 MAX 10 飞机，这为从今年早些时候一场严重的工人罢工中恢复过来的美国飞机制造商带来了可喜的鼓舞。【原文：Boeing said on Thursday Turkish low-cost carrier Pegasus Airlines had placed a firm order for a hundred 737 MAX 10 aircraft, offering a welcome boost for the U.S. planemaker recovering from a crippling worker strike earlier this year.】

item.title: 监管机构要求世界币必须删除所有虹膜扫描数据
item.description: 西班牙数据保护监督机构 AEPD 周四表示，山姆-奥特曼（Sam Altman）的公司 Worldcoin 必须删除自该项目启动以来收集到的所有虹膜扫描数据。【原文：Sam Altman's company Worldcoin must delete all iris scanning data collected since the start of the project that has sparked privacy concerns in several countries, Spanish data protection watchdog AEPD said on Thursday.】

item.title: 纽约联储在年底增加额外的每日常备回购操作
item.description: 纽约联邦储备银行周四表示，将在今年年底至 1 月初这几天增加一次常备回购机制操作。【原文：The Federal Reserve Bank of New York on Thursday said it will add an extra operation of its standing repo facility in the days covering the end of the calendar year into early January.】

item.title: 报告称美国 12 月新车销量将增长 7.3
item.description: 行业咨询公司J.D. Power和GlobalData周四在一份联合报告中称，受汽车制造商和经销商加大折扣力度的影响，12月份美国新车销量预计将增长7.3%。【原文：U.S. new vehicle sales are expected to rise 7.3% in December, aided by deeper discounts from automakers and dealers, industry consultants J.D. Power and GlobalData said in a joint report on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国 11 月成屋销售跃升至八个月新高
item.description: 美国现房销售在 11 月份飙升至八个月来的新高，但较高的抵押贷款利率和房价仍是迈向 2025 年的制约因素。【原文：U.S. existing home sales surged to an eight-month high in November, but higher mortgage rates and house prices remain a constraint heading into 2025.】

item.title: 自称比特币发明者的人因 1.2 万亿美元的英国诉讼藐视法庭
item.description: 周四，一名谎称发明了比特币的澳大利亚计算机科学家因在英国对推特创始人杰克-多西（Jack Dorsey）的支付公司Block提起价值9110亿英镑（约合1.2万亿美元）的诉讼而被认定藐视法庭。【原文：An Australian computer scientist who falsely claimed he invented bitcoin was on Thursday found in contempt of court for bringing a 911 billion-pound ($1.2 trillion) lawsuit against Twitter founder Jack Dorsey's payments company Block in Britain.】

item.title: 费城联储制造业指数跌至 20 个月低点
item.description: 12 月份，美国中大西洋地区制造业活动的一项指标下滑至近两年来的最低点，新订单和装运量双双萎缩，表明工厂行业仍处于低迷状态。【原文：A gauge of manufacturing activity in the U.S. Mid-Atlantic region slid to the lowest in nearly two years in December, with new orders and shipments both contracting in an indication the factory sector remains in a slump.】

item.title: 信息》报道：美国要求英伟达调查其芯片如何流入中国
item.description: 据《信息时报》周四援引一位与美国商务部关系密切的人士的话报道，美国商务部最近要求英伟达公司调查过去一年中该公司的产品是如何流入中国的。【原文：The U.S. Department of Commerce has recently asked Nvidia to look into how the company's products ended up in China over the past year, the Information reported on Thursday, citing a person close to the department.】

item.title: 美国第三季度经济增长上调
item.description: 在强劲的消费支出推动下，美国第三季度经济增长速度超过了此前的预期。【原文：The U.S. economy grew faster than previously estimated in the third quarter, driven by robust consumer spending.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数降幅超过预期
item.description: 上周新申请失业救济金的美国人数降幅超过预期，这与劳动力市场状况逐渐降温的趋势一致。【原文：The number of Americans filing new applications for jobless benefits fell more than expected last week, consistent with a gradual cooling in labor market conditions.】

item.title: 二手车零售商 CarMax 公布两年多来首次季度销售增长，股价大涨
item.description: CarMax周四公布了两年多来首次季度销售增长报告，这是二手车市场从数月低迷中反弹的早期迹象，使该零售商的股价在收盘前上涨了6%以上。【原文：CarMax on Thursday reported its first quarterly sales increase in more than two years, in an early sign that the used car market was rebounding from months of slump, sending the retailer's shares up more than 6% before the bell.】

item.title: 报告称，2024 年加密货币黑客攻击造成的损失将跃升至 22 亿美元
item.description: 区块链分析公司Chainalysis周四发布的一份报告显示，2024年，通过黑客攻击加密货币平台窃取的资金比一年前激增21%，达到22亿美元。【原文：Funds stolen by hacking cryptocurrency platforms surged 21% from a year ago to $2.2 billion in 2024, a report from blockchain analysis firm Chainalysis showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 英国央行维持借贷成本不变，对利率前景看法不一
item.description: 英国央行决策者周四在是否降息的问题上出现分歧，尽管通胀压力挥之不去，但寻求通过降低借贷成本来帮助经济放缓的官员人数多于预期。【原文：Bank of England policymakers split over whether to cut interest rates on Thursday with more officials than expected seeking to help the slowing economy with lower borrowing costs despite lingering inflation pressure.】

item.title: 央行宽松政策大年收官，英国央行鸽派，美联储谨慎
item.description: 英国央行周四维持利率稳定，结束了央行降息大年，一天前美联储放宽了政策，但暗示将在2025年更加谨慎。【原文：The Bank of England wrapped up a big year of central bank rate cuts by keeping rates steady on Thursday, a day after the Federal Reserve eased policy but suggested it would be more cautious in 2025.】

item.title: 美元树临时首席执行官 Michael Creedon 将担任全职职务
item.description: Dollar Tree 周四表示，其临时首席执行官 Michael Creedon 将全职担任这一职务。【原文：Dollar Tree said on Thursday its interim CEO Michael Creedon would take on the role full-time.】

item.title: 康奈格拉季度销售额高于预期
item.description: 康奈格拉品牌公司（Conagra Brands）周四公布的季度销售额降幅小于预期，原因是其食品杂货、零食和冷冻餐包等类别的降价帮助其恢复了过去几年中萎靡不振的需求。【原文：Conagra Brands on Thursday posted a smaller-than-expected drop in quarterly sales, as price cuts across its groceries, snacks and frozen meal kits categories helped it recover lapsed demand over the last few years.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，特斯拉正与奥斯汀市就自动驾驶汽车技术进行谈判
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周四报道，特斯拉正在与德克萨斯州奥斯汀市当局就其自动驾驶汽车技术进行早期谈判。【原文：Tesla is in early talks with the authorities in the city of Austin, Texas, regarding its autonomous vehicle technology, Bloomberg News reported on Thursday.】

item.title: Arm和高通将在芯片许可纠纷案中进行结案陈词
item.description: Arm Holdings 和高通公司（Qualcomm）的律师将于周五在一宗案件中进行结案陈词，该案可能会颠覆高通公司凭借一款在速度上可与苹果和英特尔匹敌的芯片进军个人电脑市场的计划。【原文：Lawyers for Arm Holdings , and Qualcomm are set to make closing arguments on Friday in a case that could upend Qualcomm's push into the PC market with a chip meant to rival Apple and Intel on speed.】

item.title: 英国央行维持利率稳定，政策分歧扩大
item.description: 作者：大卫-米利肯和苏班-阿卜杜拉【原文：By David Milliken and Suban Abdulla】

item.title: 默克公司的艾滋病治疗药物达到两项后期研究的主要目标
item.description: 默克公司（Merck）周四表示，其用于治疗部分成人 HIV-1 感染者的实验性药物组合达到了两项后期研究的主要目标。【原文：Merck said on Thursday its experimental drug combination to treat some adults with HIV-1 infection met the main goal of two late-stage studies.】

item.title: 埃森哲季度收入超出预期
item.description: IT服务提供商埃森哲周四公布的第一季度营收超出华尔街预期，原因是市场对其帮助客户采用人工智能工具的服务需求不断增长。【原文：IT service provider Accenture beat Wall Street estimates for first-quarter revenue on Thursday, on the back of growing demand for its services to help clients adopt AI-powered tools.】

item.title: 美光暴跌，黯淡的季度业绩预期为人工智能相关的提振蒙上阴影
item.description: 美光科技公司（Micron Technology）周四在盘前交易中股价暴跌 15%，原因是该公司发布了一份令人沮丧的业绩预测，预示着个人电脑和智能手机需求疲软将挤压人工智能相关芯片销售的稳健增长。【原文：Micron Technology shares plummeted 15% in premarket trading on Thursday following a dismal forecast that signaled a squeeze from weak demand for personal computers and smartphones, overshadowing a solid lift from sales of AI-related chips.】

item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 美国亚马逊员工在圣诞大促前举行罢工，工会寻求合同谈判
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）七家美国工厂的工人周四在假日购物高峰期间提前下班，旨在向该零售商施压，迫使其与工会进行合同谈判。【原文：Amazon.com workers at seven U.S. facilities walked off the job early on Thursday during the holiday shopping rush, aiming to pressure the retailer into contract talks with their union.】
